|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR2312; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = MIPS R4000 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->

|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Alpha Networks WAP-G02 (8WAPG02..2A1) ('''D-Link''' DWL-2100AP unk. revision, '''Conceptronic''' CT54APT, '''Planex''' GW-AP54SGX?, unknown '''ALFA''' product?) :This device may use AR2313A..
[http://www.broadbandreports.com/forum/remark,12045206 On the DSLReports forum] (flashing the unit with DWL-2100AP firmware)
According to the manual, the default SSID is '''default'''.
Notes:
- No firmware found. But, if it is possible to install D-Link DWL-2100AP, then it is vxworks 5.4.2
==Links of Interest== [http://www.airlink101.com/download/download_links/ap411w_manual.pdf Manual]
